content: granite cowl created by lisa overby this chunky weight cowl is the perfect project for beginner knitters master the knit and purl stitches as well as pattern reading as you make your first project © 2025 yarn twisters 1 granite cowl materials & info abbreviations yarn 1 skein yarn twisters carter 140 yards/ bobble - bind off 115g 80% superwash wool 20% nylon or any chunky weight yarn co - cast on sample knit with colourway ytyellow k - knit p - purl gauge 14 sts by 20 row equal 4 by 4 in pattern in the round after blocking round - round needles 8mm mm us 11 16 circular st/sts - stitch/stitches needle or size needed to obtain gauge notions stitch marker darning needle finished size circumference 20 51cm height 7 18cm notes see page 3 for links to video tutorials pattern instructions using the long tail method co 72 sts join to k rnds 14 & 15 *k1 p1* repeat ** to end of in the round place a st marker to denote the round beginning of the round rnds 16 to 39 repeat rnds 8 to 15 three more times rnds 1 to 5 k rnds 40 & 41 k rnds 6 & 7 p rnds 42 & 43 p rnds 44 to 48 k rnds 8 & 9 k rnds 10 & 11 *p1 k1* repeat ** to end of loosely bobble all sts weave in ends round rnds 12 & 13 k rnd6 rnd7 rnd8 rnd9 rnd10 rnd11 rnd12 rnd13 rnd14 rnd15 rnd16 rnd17 rnd18 rnd19 rnd20 rnd21 rnd22 rnd23 rnd24 rnd25 rnd26 rnd27 rnd28 rnd29 rnd30 rnd31 rnd32 rnd33 rnd34 rnd35 rnd36 rnd37 rnd38 rnd39 rnd40 rnd41 rnd42 rnd43 rnd44 rnd45 rnd46 rnd47 rnd48 © 2025 yarn twisters 2 granite cowl video links purl stitch p long tail cast on https //www youtube com/ https //www youtube com/ watch v=b3jpvdb6mau watch v=vzgqnhmlloe bind off bobble knit stitch k https //www youtube com/ https //www youtube com/ watch v=vrczdngom_e watch v=opdbhdhkvng weaving in ends join to knit in the round https //www youtube com/ https //www youtube com/ watch v=ctabjqt_dxw watch v=i295-6w0qv4 © 2025 yarn twisters 3 granite cowl
